parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>The provided post does not contain a CMF number.  While the absence of a CMF number doesn't automatically exclude it from being electoral propaganda, it suggests it might not be directly linked to an official campaign.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>The post clearly refers to Alina Gorghiu. While the post doesn't explicitly mention her candidacy for the parliamentary elections, the images showing "Nr. 4 pe buletinul de vot" (Number 4 on the ballot) strongly imply a connection to her candidacy. This satisfies Article 36 (7) - a.</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>The post is a paid Facebook advertisement, targeting a wide audience within a specified geographic area (Argeș County). This clearly addresses the wide population, satisfying Article 36 (7) - c.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>The images directly link Alina Gorghiu to a ballot number, clearly aiming to influence voters to choose her. The link to her website further reinforces this objective.  The overall objective is to increase votes for Alina Gorghiu, satisfying Article 36 (7) - c. The timing of the ad, close to election day, further strengthens this conclusion.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>The content is not journalistic in nature. It lacks objective reporting or analysis. Instead, it promotes Alina Gorghiu's candidacy through visual cues and a link to her website. It does not adhere to journalistic standards of impartiality and factual reporting.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>The post does not express a personal opinion; it's a clear promotional campaign for Alina Gorghiu's candidacy.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>2558185481042152</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The Facebook post, given its paid nature, targeting a specific geographic area, visual cues directly linking Alina Gorghiu to a ballot number, and the link to her website, strongly suggests it's a form of electoral propaganda.  The absence of a CMF number is not conclusive, as the visual cues and context strongly suggest an electoral objective. The post aims to influence voters in Argeș County to vote for Alina Gorghiu.  The timing of the ad, close to the election, further strengthens this conclusion.  While the text is minimal, the visual elements and context are sufficient to classify it as electoral propaganda.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate> <name>Alina Gorghiu</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>INDEPENDENT</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
Alina Gorghiu, pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea unei reclame plătite pe Facebook (ID postare: 2558185481042152), după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, cu imagini care o asociază direct cu numărul 4 de pe buletinul de vot și un link către site-ul său, având ca efect electoral influențarea voturilor în favoarea sa în județul Argeș. Reclama, deși cu text minimal, utilizează imagini și context pentru a îndeplini toate criteriile propagandei electorale, vizând populația din Argeș, cu o cheltuială de 500-599 RON și o estimare a impactului de 70.000-80.000 impresii.  Lipsa unui număr CMF nu exclude incriminarea, având în vedere contextul și scopul evident electoral al postării.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
